DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , retrospective , observational study evaluate compliance RoActemra/Actemra ( tocilizumab ) therapy patient moderate severe rheumatoid arthritis . Six month data collect patient record .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study RoActemra/Actemra Patients With Moderate Severe Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: Adult patient , 18 year age Moderate severe rheumatoid arthritis RoActemra/Actemra treatment must initiate 6 month prior sign inform consent form Patients rheumatic autoimmune disease rheumatoid arthritis Patients willing sign inform consent form Patients participate interventional trial period observational study
